alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:11PM CDT until June 03 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CRAWFORD AND NORTHWESTERN SEBASTIAN COUNTIES... At 210 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Barling, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Barling... Arkoma... Bonanza... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Jenny Lind... Central City... Mill Creek... Rye Hill... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 540 between mile markers 2 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
